Please do not file questions or support requests on the GitHub issues tracker.

You can get your questions answered using other communication channels. Please see:  https://github.com/NationalBankBelgium/ngx-form-errors/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#got-a-question-or-problem

Thank you!
